body: How does it work? I voted and it said in chat I had extra xp but I didn't get a notification and didn't notice a difference in my xp bar..
body_tagged: How does it work? I voted and it said in chat I had extra xp but I didn't get a notification and didn't notice a difference in my xp bar..
title: Voting

replies.body: you might have to do /redeem or something
replies.body_tagged: you might have to do /redeem or something

replies.body: After voting you must return to the hub. There will be an emerald that can gift you XP in any gamemode that you wish. You may have to relog.
replies.body_tagged: After voting you must return to the hub. There will be an emerald that can gift you XP in any gamemode that you wish. You may have to relog.

replies.body: Rejoin the server and you will get a XP Package, right click and choose for what game mode you want it for by left-clicking it. Glad it helped!
replies.body_tagged: Rejoin the server and you will get a XP Package, right click and choose for what game mode you want it for by left-clicking it. Glad it helped!
